mean_cn: n. 稀释，稀释法，冲淡物
mean_en: weakening (reducing the concentration) by the addition of water or a thinner
word_etyma: dilut稀释 + ion名词后缀 → dilution 稀释
sentence: The dilution of the red coloring turned the water pink.
sentence_trans: 红色被稀释后，将水染成了粉红色。
sentence_phrase: The dilution of the red coloring
